tool.name: CreateSingleDCAFeatureClasses
tool.displayname: Make Single DCA Value Feature Classes

param.name: Geodatabse for output files
param.displayname: Geodatabase Where Files Will Be Written
param.dialogReference: Provided a path to a file geodatabase where processed files will be written.

param.name: Year which analysis will begin
param.dialogReference: Select a start year for analysis to begin

param.name: Year which analysis will end
param.dialogReference: Select a end year for analysis to end

param.name: DCA Value
param.dialogReference: Select as many or as little DCA values as you would like to have the analysis performed on

tool.summary: This tool is used to take historic ADS up to the year 2016 that have been translated from DCA1, DCA2, DCA3 to table where each DCA value has its own row in the table. This tool specifically takes these translated data tables and combines instances where a polygon has multiple DCA values with different host tree species into a single value DCA value where the host tree species is ignored but the TPA value is summed.

idCitation.resTitle: Make Single DCA Value Feature Classes

dataIdInfo.idAbs: This tool is used to take historic ADS up to the year 2016 that have been translated from DCA1, DCA2, DCA3 to table where each DCA value has its own row in the table. This tool specifically takes these translated data tables and combines instances where a polygon has multiple DCA values with different host tree species into a single value DCA value where the host tree species is ignored but the TPA value is summed.
